Words in season useful for those whose hearts are engaged to serve the will of God in this generation / from Abraham Cheare. Cheare, Abraham, d. 1668.
[14], 294 p.
Printed for Nathan Brookes, London : 1668.
"I. Faith's conquest over the tortures and tenders of an hour of temptation, on Heb. 11.35. II. The embalming of a dead cause, on Mark 14.8 III. Remarkable discourses on his dying-bed, with copies and extracts of letters, on several occasions." Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
